description:
Whether you're skinning into remote destinations or dropping in by heli, the snow-tuned features provide an extra boost of safety for your most epic adventures. The Soelden Pro 32 gets even better with its next-gen Alpride E2 Airbag System delivering improved performance in a lighter and more compact package for advanced backcountry travel. The included deployment system is powered by a supercapacitator, so it's not temperature sensitive like traditional lithium-ion batteries and it's non-hazardous for travel.

  • Alpride E2 supercapacitator system for powerful and repeatable airbag deployment in the event of an avalanche
  • High-speed supercapacitor rapidly inflates the airbag without the need for heavy canisters
  • NanoFly® UHMWPE and nylon fabric is light and abrasion-resistant
  • Thermoformed, contoured EVA foam back panel and shoulder straps shed snow
  • Large zipper pulls and buckles for use with gloves on
  • Easily access the main compartment via the rear access panel even with skis attached
  • Dedicated avi gear storage pocket with wide J-shaped zip accommodates large shovels
  • Sled carry attachment loops
  • Internal carry harness for GPS or radio
  • Stowable helmet holder and ice tool loops ensure you're ready for more technical terrain
  • Deployment system recharges with 2 AA batteries or USB
name: Osprey Soelden Pro 32 Avy Airbag
